parameters.name: SelectedCustomParam
parameters.label: *WIP* Property dimension
parameters.query:
let noneRow = datatable(HeaderVal: string) ["none"];

union noneRow
,(
requests
| extend CustomHeaders = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-custom-headers"]))
| mv-expand bagexpansion=array CustomHeaders
| extend HeaderVal = tostring(CustomHeaders[0])
| summarize by HeaderVal
| where isnotempty(HeaderVal))

content.query:
let selectedParam = '{SelectedCustomParam}';
requests
| extend CustomHeaders = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-custom-headers"]))
| extend SelectedParamValue = tostring(coalesce(CustomHeaders[selectedParam], "no-value"))
| extend UsageData = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage))
| extend Model = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).model)))
| extend PromptTokens = toreal(UsageData["prompt_tokens"])
| extend CompletionTokens = toreal(UsageData["completion_tokens"])
| extend TotalTokens = toreal(UsageData["total_tokens"])
| extend Duration = round(duration,2)
| extend PromptCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.0015, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.03, 0.0))
| extend CompletionCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.002, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.06, 0.0))
| extend TotalCost = PromptCost + CompletionCost
| summarize RequestCount=count(), TotalTokens=sum(TotalTokens), TotalCost=round(sum(TotalCost),5), DurationPerRequest=round(avg(Duration),2), CostPerRequest=round(avg(TotalCost),5) by SelectedParamValue

let summary = requests
| extend UsageData = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage))
| extend Model = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).model)))
| extend TotalTokens = toreal(UsageData["total_tokens"])
| extend Duration = round(duration,2)
| extend PromptTokens = toreal(UsageData["prompt_tokens"])
| extend CompletionTokens = toreal(UsageData["completion_tokens"])
| extend PromptCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.0015, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.03, 0.0))
| extend CompletionCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.002, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.06, 0.0))
| extend TotalCost = PromptCost + CompletionCost
| extend Success = tobool(success)
| summarize 
    RequestCount=toreal(count()), 
    FailedRequests=toreal(sumif(1, Success == false)),
    TotalTokens=sum(TotalTokens), 
    TotalCost=round(sum(TotalCost),5), 
    DurationPerRequest=round(avg(Duration),2), 
    CostPerRequest=round(avg(TotalCost),5);
summary 
| project Metric = "1. Total Requests", Value = RequestCount
| union (summary | project Metric = "2. Failed Requests", Value = FailedRequests)
| union (summary | project Metric = "3. Total Tokens", Value = TotalTokens)
| union (summary | project Metric = "4. Total Cost", Value = TotalCost)
| union (summary | project Metric = "5. Cost Per Request", Value = CostPerRequest)
| union (summary | project Metric = "6. Duration Per Request", Value = DurationPerRequest)
content.title: Totals by time range
Token usage over time

content.query:
requests
| extend Model = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).model)))
| extend UsageData = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage))
| extend PromptTokens = toreal(UsageData["prompt_tokens"]), CompletionTokens = toreal(UsageData["completion_tokens"])
| extend PromptCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (PromptTokens/1000)*0.0015, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (PromptTokens/1000)*0.03, 0.0))
| extend CompletionCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (CompletionTokens/1000)*0.002, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (CompletionTokens/1000)*0.06, 0.0))
| extend TotalCost = PromptCost + CompletionCost
| summarize totalCost=sum(TotalCost), promptCost=sum(PromptCost), completionCost=sum(CompletionCost) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| project timestamp, totalCost, promptCost, completionCost
| render timechart
content.title: Total cost over time

content.query:
requests
| summarize ResponseDuration = avg(duration) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Average response time

content.query:
requests
| summarize Count=count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), performanceBucket
| extend BucketOrder = case(
    performanceBucket == "<250ms", 1,
    performanceBucket == "250ms-500ms", 2,
    performanceBucket == "500ms-1sec", 3,
    performanceBucket == "1sec-3sec", 4,
    performanceBucket == "3sec-7sec", 5,
    performanceBucket == "7sec-15sec", 6,
    performanceBucket == "15sec-30sec", 7,
    performanceBucket == ">30sec", 8,
    0
)
| project performanceBucket, Count, BucketOrder
| order by BucketOrder asc
content.title: Performance buckets

content.json:
# Usage
### Click on a performance bucket above to filter requests by bucket.
### Click on a row below to view the details of that request.

content.query:
let PerformanceBucketFilter = '{PerformanceBucketFilter}';
let SelectedCustomParam = '{SelectedCustomParam}';
let SelectedParamValue = '{SelectedParamValue}';

requests
| where operation_Name == "OpenAIProxy;rev=1 - Completions_Create" or operation_Name == "OpenAIProxy;rev=1 - ChatCompletions_Create"
| where PerformanceBucketFilter == "All" or performanceBucket == PerformanceBucketFilter
| extend requestId = customDimensions.["Request Id"]
| extend Prompt = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-Body"])).messages[-1].content))))
| extend Generation = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).choices))[0].message)).content
| extend promptTokens = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage)).prompt_tokens
| extend completionTokens = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage)).completion_tokens
| extend totalTokens = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage)).total_tokens
| extend CustomHeaders = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-custom-headers"]))
| extend status = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).statusCode
| extend errorMessage = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).message
| where (SelectedCustomParam == "" or SelectedParamValue == "none") or (CustomHeaders.[SelectedCustomParam] == SelectedParamValue)
| project timestamp, status, Prompt, Generation, round(duration,2), totalTokens, promptTokens, completionTokens, success, CustomHeaders, requestId,  errorMessage
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: Requests table

content.query:
let SelectedRequest = '{SelectedRequest}'; let MetaData = requests | where tostring(customDimensions.["Request Id"]) == SelectedRequest or SelectedRequest == 'ALL' | extend requestId = customDimensions.["Request Id"] | extend Duration = tostring(round(duration,2)), Success = tostring(success), PerformanceBucket = tostring(performanceBucket) | extend ErrorMessage = tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).message) | extend RequestSize = tostring(customMeasurements["Request Size"]), ResponseSize = tostring(customMeasurements["Response Size"]) | extend Model = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).model))) | extend OperationName = tostring(customDimensions["Operation Name"]) | extend UsageData = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).usage)) | extend TotalTokens = toreal(UsageData["total_tokens"]), CompletionTokens = toreal(UsageData["completion_tokens"]), PromptTokens = toreal(UsageData["prompt_tokens"]) | extend PromptCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.0015, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (PromptTokens/1000) * 0.03, 0.0)) | extend CompletionCost = iif(Model == "gpt-35-turbo", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.002, iif(Model == "gpt-4", (CompletionTokens/1000) * 0.06, 0.0)) | extend EstimatedCost = PromptCost + CompletionCost | project Metadata=strcat("| | |\n|--:|--|\n", "| **Request ID** |", requestId, "|\n", "| **Duration** | ", Duration, " ms |\n| **Success** | ", Success, " ", ErrorMessage, " |\n| **Request Size** | ", RequestSize, " bytes |\n| **Response Size** | ", ResponseSize, " bytes |\n| **Total Tokens** | ", tostring(TotalTokens), " |\n| **Completion Tokens** | ", tostring(CompletionTokens), " |\n| **Prompt Tokens** | ", tostring(PromptTokens), "|\n| **Performance Bucket** | ", PerformanceBucket, "|\n| **Model** | ", Model, "|\n| **Operation Name** | ", OperationName, " |\n| **Estimated Cost**
assumes gpt-35-turbo
or gpt-4, no discounts | $", tostring(round(EstimatedCost, 4)), " |"); MetaData
content.title: Request Metadata
content.noDataMessage: Select a request in the table above to see details.

content.query:
let SelectedRequest = '{SelectedRequest}';
let SystemMessages = requests
| where customDimensions.["Request Id"] == SelectedRequest or 'ALL' == SelectedRequest
| extend MessagesArray = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-Body"])).messages))
| mv-expand MessagesArray
| where tostring(MessagesArray["role"]) == "system"
| project ChatHistoryRow=strcat("ðŸ”” **System**: ", tostring(MessagesArray["content"]), "\n"), Order=1;

let UserAndAssistantMessages = requests
| where customDimensions.["Request Id"] == SelectedRequest or 'ALL' == SelectedRequest
| extend MessagesArray = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Request-Body"])).messages))
| mv-expand MessagesArray
| where tostring(MessagesArray["role"]) != "system"
| extend Role = tostring(MessagesArray["role"]), Content = tostring(MessagesArray["content"])
| extend Symbol = iif(Role == "assistant", "ðŸ¤– ", "ðŸ‘¤ ")
| project ChatHistoryRow=strcat(Symbol, "**", iif(Role == "assistant", "Assistant", "User"), "**: ", Content, "<hr>\n"), Order=2;

let FinalResponse = requests
| where customDimensions.["Request Id"] == SelectedRequest or 'ALL' == SelectedRequest
| extend Generation = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(customDimensions.["Response-Body"])).choices))[0].message)).content
| project ChatHistoryRow=strcat("ðŸ¤– **Assistant**: ", Generation, "\n"), Order=3;

SystemMessages
| union UserAndAssistantMessages, FinalResponse
| order by Order asc
| summarize ChatHistory=strcat_array(makelist(ChatHistoryRow), "\n")
content.title: Request History
content.noDataMessage: Select a request in the table above to see details.
